alert.note: Alert for Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 3:26PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Prowers and northeastern Baca Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 325 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Two Buttes, or 15 miles northeast of Springfield, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Two Buttes around 330 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
